name: federative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to a federation (= a group of organizations, countries, regions, etc. that have joined together to form a larger organization or government): The country is made up of 30 federative regions. They have formed a federative committee of experts on disease prevention.
More examplesFewer examplesThe newly independent country was declared a federative republic by its first leader.Under the treaty, the country became a federative state made up of a number of republics.The organization is run on a federative basis.
